document.full_text: two zebra newborns made their first public appearance on thursday at the st. louis zoo, new additions to the endangered population of the biggest zebras in the world.
document.title: two endangered zebras make public debut at st. louis zoo
lines_and_colors: two zebra newborns made their first public appearance on thursday at the st. louis zoo, new additions to the endangered population of the biggest zebras in the world.
